sentences.sContent: Cleo blushed. She had not meant to imply that he was lying.
sentences.sCn: 克利奥脸红了。她不是故意暗指他在撒谎的。

sentences.sContent: ...What does the man imply about Pam...
...What does the man imply about Pam...
...What does the man imply about Tom...
...What does the woman imply about Bill...
...I don't mean to imply that overall job growth doesn't have an impact on one's ability to land a job...
...The food industry tries to imply that a calorie is a calorie is a calorie...
...You know she was popular even when she was a child...

remMethod.val: im(进入) ＋ ply(重叠) → 重叠表达 → 暗示， 意指

trans.tranOther: to suggest that something is true, without saying this directly
